void CNFamilialAnalysisMethodIsoUPD::run (  )  [virtual]

Run the analysis.

isoUPD is when the index inherets two copies of one allele from one parent. (LOH + CN=2 + and genotype concordance with only one parent)

Implements CNFamilialAnalysisMethod.
